thread.title: Janet Jackson goes on vocal rest, postpones shows
thread.title_full: Janet Jackson goes on vocal rest, postpones shows

title: Janet Jackson goes on vocal rest, postpones shows
text:
Janet Jackson goes on vocal rest, postpones shows She'll be rescheduling the cancelled tour dates, she tweeted. Post to Facebook Janet Jackson goes on vocal rest, postpones shows She'll be rescheduling the cancelled tour dates, she tweeted. Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://usat.ly/1N1hxla Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Janet Jackson goes on vocal rest, postpones shows Carly Mallenbaum , USA TODAY 5:45 p.m. EDT October 25, 2015 Janet Jackson tweeted is going on a brief vocal rest. (Photo: Chris Pizzello, Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP) 6 CONNECT 11 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Janet Jackson isn't going to be singing for fans this weekend. 
The performer tweeted that she's on vocal rest, "Doctor's orders," and has to miss her planned shows on Saturday in Salt Lake City and Sunday in Denver. The tour dates have not yet been rescheduled. Hey you guys, I must rest my vocal chords. Doctor's orders... Will be rescheduling Salt Lake and Denver. (cont) https://t.co/MFT9x2WK0X â€” Janet Jackson (@JanetJackson) October 24, 2015 
Jackson is in the middle of her Unbreakable World Tour, which has stops in the U.S., the U.K. and Japan through next summer. Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/1N1hxla TOP VIDEOS
